rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of all basketball coaches. This collection includes assistant and head coaches.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Basketball Coach

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a basketball coach to the total number of times that a team led by the coach has lost a playoff game.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Career Playoff Losses

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a basketball coach to the total number of times that a team led by the coach has won a playoff game.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Career Playoff Wins
Career Losses
rdf:Description.mso:type.property.deprecation_info: Use basketball.team.team_stats to record this information. DeprecatedBy:[REDMOND\ianiles] Successor:[mso:basketball.team.team_stats]

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Career Wins
rdf:Description.mso:type.property.deprecation_info: Use basketball.team.team_stats to record this information. DeprecatedBy:[REDMOND\ianiles] Successor:[mso:basketball.team.team_stats]

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of all basketball leagues, including conferences, divisions, etc. In the NBA, top-level leagues are referred to as conferences, which are then further divided into divisions. In US college-level basketball, conferences are the second-tier of subdividing teams.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Basketball Conference

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a basketball league to another basketball league which is a part of the first. For example, this property can be used to relate an NBA conference to one of its divisions.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: League

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A virtual property that relates a basketball league to one of the teams making up the league.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Teams

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of all basketball divisions. In the NBA, divisions are the second-level subdividing teams, and in college-level basketball in the US, divisions are the first-tier of subdivision of basketball teams.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Basketball Division
rdf:Description.mso:type.type.deprecation_info: Use basketball.conference for any basketball league. DeprecatedBy:[REDMOND\ianiles] Successor:[mso:basketball.conference]

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of all basketball players. This collection includes professional and college-level basketball players.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Basketball Player

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a basketball player to an award won by the player.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Award

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A virtual property that relates a basketball player to the overall statistics for the player.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Career Averages

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a basketball player to one of the positions occupied by the player in his career, e.g. forward or point guard.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Position

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Relationship collecting data on a basketball player's career statistics. Career statistics represent the totality of the players statistics over his or her career.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Basketball Player Career Stats

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the number of passes by the given player to a teammate that have resulted in a basket.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Assists

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Average Assists
A property that specifies the average number of blocks in a basketball game made by the given player.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Average Blocks

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the average number of points made in a game by the given player.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Average Points

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the average number of steals made in a game by the given player.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Average Steals

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the average number of turnovers made in a game by the given player.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Average Turnovers

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the number of times that the given player legally prevented a basket by an offensive player.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Blocks

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the number of times that the given player, while on the defensive team, took possession of the ball after a failed basket.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Defensive Rebounds

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the ratio of total field goals made to total field goals attempted by the given basketball player.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Field Goal Percentage

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the total number of baskets attempted by the given player.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Field Goals Attempted

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the total number of baskets made by the given player.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Field Goals Made

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the ratio of total free throws made to total free throws attempted by the given player.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Free Throw Percentage

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the total number of unopposed attempts by the given player to score points from the foul line on the basketball court.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Free Throws Attempted

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the total number of unopposed and successful attempts by the given player to score points from the foul line on the basketball court.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Free Throws Made

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the total number of basketball games in which the given player participated.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Games Played

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:basketball.player_career_stats relationship to the number of minutes the player played in total for all professional games.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Minutes Played

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the number of times that the given player, while on the offensive team, took possession of the ball after a failed basket.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Offensive Rebounds

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the basketball player for whom the statistics are true.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Player

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:basketball.player_career_stats relationship to the total number of fouls attributed to the player for all professional games.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Player Fouls

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the total number of points scored by the given basketball player.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Points

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the total number of defensive and offensive rebounds made by the given player.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Rebounds

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Average Rebounds
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: avg reb

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the total number of times that the given player legally caused a turnover by his own action.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Steals

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the total number of three-point field goals attempted by the given player.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Three Point Field Goals Attempted

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the total number of three-point field goals made by the given player.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Three Point Field Goals Made

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the ratio of total three-point field goals made to total three-point field goals attempted.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Three Point Percentage

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the total number of times that the given player lost possession of the ball to the opposing team before the player's team made an attempted basket.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Turnovers

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Relationship collecting data on a basketball player's statistics for a given season and on a particular team.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Basketball Player Statistics

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the number of passes by the given player in the given season to a teammate that resulted in a basket.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Assists

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the average number of assists in a basketball game made by the given player in the given season.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Average Assists

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the average number of blocks in a basketball game made by the given player.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Average Blocks

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the average number of fouls in a basketball game made by the given player in the given season.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Average Player Fouls

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the average number of points made in a basketball game by the given player in the given season.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Average Points

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the average number of rebounds made in a basketball game by the given player in the given season.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Average Rebounds

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the average number of steals made in a basketball game by the given player in the given season.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Average Steals

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the average number of turnovers made in a basketball game by the given player in the given season.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Average Turnovers

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the number of times that the given player in the given season legally prevented a basket by an offensive player.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Blocks

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the number of times that the given player, while on the defensive team, took possession of the ball after a failed basket in the given season.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Defensive Rebounds

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the ratio of total field goals made to total field goals attempted by the given basketball player in the given season.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Field Goal Percentage

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the total number of baskets attempted by the given player in the given season.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Field Goals Attempted

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the total number of baskets made by the given player in the given season.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Field Goals Made

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the ratio of total free throws made to total free throws attempted by the given player in the given season.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Free Throw Percentage

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the total number of unopposed attempts by the given player to score points from the foul line on the basketball court during the given season.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Free Throws Attempted

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the total number of unopposed and successful attempts by the given player to score points from the foul line on the basketball court during the given season.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Free Throws Made

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the total number of basketball games in which the given player participated during the given season.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Games

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:basketball.player_stats relationship to the number of minutes the player played in professional games for the given season.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Minutes Played

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the number of times that the given player, while on the offensive team, took possession of the ball after a failed basket in the given season.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Offensive Rebounds

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the basketball player about which team/season statistics are provided.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Player

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:basketball.player_career_stats relationship to the total number of fouls attributed to the player for the given season.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Player Fouls

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the total number of points scored by the given basketball player during the given season.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Points

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the total number of defensive and offensive rebounds made by the given player during the given season.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Rebounds

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the season for which the given statistics are valid.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Season

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the total number of times that the given player legally caused a turnover by his own action during the given season.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Steals

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the team to which the given player belonged when the statistics were valid.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Team

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the total number of three-point field goals attempted by the given player during the given season.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Three-Point Field Goals Attempted

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the total number of three-point field goals made by the given player during the given season.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Three-Point Field Goals Made

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the ratio of total three-point field goals made to total three-point field goals attempted by the given player in the given season.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Three Point Percentage

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the total number of times that the given player lost possession of the ball to the opposing team before the player's team made an attempted basket in the given season.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Turnovers

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the set of all basketball positions. This set includes concepts like small forwards and centers.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Basketball Position

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A virtual property that relates a basketball position, e.g. forward or point guard, to a basketball player who has held this position at some point in his or her career.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Players

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of all basketball teams, both professional and college teams.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Basketball Team

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A virtual property that relates a basketball team to statistics regarding the team's performance in a particular season.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Team Statistics

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Relationship collecting data on a basketball teams statistics for a given season.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Basketball Team Stats

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the number of passes by a player of the given team in the given season to a teammate that resulted in a basket.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Assists

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the average number of assists in a basketball game made by the given team in the given season.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Average Assists

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the average number of blocks in a basketball game made by the given team.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Average Blocks

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the average number of points made in a basketball game by the given team in the given season.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Average Points

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the average number of rebounds made in a basketball game by the given team in the given season.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Average Rebounds

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the average number of steals made in a basketball game by the given team in the given season.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Average Steals

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the average number of turnovers made in a basketball game by the given team in the given season.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Average Turnovers

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the number of times that the given team in the given season legally prevented a basket by an offensive player.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Blocks

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the number of times that the given team, while playing defensively, took possession of the ball after a failed basket in the given season.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Defensive Rebounds

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the ratio of total field goals made to total field goals attempted by the given basketball team in the given season.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Field Goal Percentage

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the total number of baskets attempted by the given team in the given season.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Field Goals Attempted

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the total number of baskets made by the given team in the given season.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Field Goals Made

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the ratio of total free throws made to total free throws attempted by the given team in the given season.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Free Throw Percentage

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the total number of unopposed attempts by the given team to score points from the foul line on the basketball court during the given season.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Free Throws Attempted

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the total number of unopposed and successful attempts by the given team to score points from the foul line on the basketball court during the given season.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Free Throws Made

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the total number of games lost by the given team in the given season.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Losses

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the number of times that the given team, while playing offensively, took possession of the ball after a failed basket in the given season.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Offensive Rebounds

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the total number of points scored by the given team during the given season.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Points

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the total number of defensive and offensive rebounds made by the given team during the given season.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Rebounds

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the season for which the given statistics are valid.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Season

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the total number of times that the given team legally caused a turnover by the action of one of its players during the given season.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Steals

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the basketball team for which the given statistics are valid.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Team

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the total number of three-point field goals attempted by the given team during the given season.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Three-Point Field Goals Attempted

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the total number of three-point field goals made by the given team during the given season.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Three-Point Field Goals Made

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the ratio of total three-point field goals made to total three-point field goals attempted by the given team in the given season.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Three Point Percentage

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the total number of times that the given team lost possession of the ball to the opposing team before a basket was attempted in the given season.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Turnovers

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the total number of games won by the given team in the given season.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Wins
